name: Pocket Dimension
description: Teleport in and out of your own personal pocket dimension!

x.command: execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posX int 1 run data get entity @s Position[0]

y.command: execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posY int 1 run data get entity @s Position[1]

z.command: execute store result storage limeorigins:storage posZ int 1 run data get entity @s Position[2]

x.command: execute store result @s position[0] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posX

y.command: execute store result @s position[1] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posY

z.command: execute store result @s position[2] run data get storage limeorigins:storage posZ

remove_box.command: execute at @s unless entity @e[x=~-25,y=~-25,z=~-25,dx=50,dy=50,dz=50,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..0.1] run execute at @s run fill ~-25 ~-25 ~-25 ~25 ~25 ~25 minecraft:air
